text_line_height=”1.6em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-19px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”]

SAY I DO IN STYLE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.0″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false”]

WEDDING VENUE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.0″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”]

Taking the big leap, eh? Well good on you! You’ve found a lid for your potjie, your happily-ever-after and (hopefully) paid your lobola. You’re not like the rest, so why get married like the rest? 26 Degree South hotel offers affordable wedding venues with accommodation to make life a little easier on your special day. So, come and celebrate your special day @ the coolest wedding venue in Muldersdrift!

We’re not the boasting type, but if we were, we’d tell you that our 120 seater fantabulistic wedding reception hall is a sight to behold. “Why?”, You ask. Because we do things the bush-boho way!

While your loved ones enjoy their drinks, our bush-boho chefs will perfectly prepare the meats of your choice on our inside-the-venue braais, not only creating a unique wedding experience, but a tantalising atmosphere as well.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.0″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” max_width=”1300px” custom_padding=”1px|||||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.0″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_gallery gallery_ids=”24775,24776,24777,24778,24779,24780,24781″ gallery_orderby=”rand” dbdb_version=”3.3.6″ show_title_and_caption=”off” show_pagination=”off” _builder_version=”4.8.0″ _module_preset=”default” border_width_all=”5px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF”][/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#16a0aa” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”14px||10px|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_button button_url=”#OPEN” button_text=”CLICK HERE TO ENQUIRE” button_alignment=”center” module_id=”overlay_unique_id_24977″ _builder_version=”4.8.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
